docs.lead_paragraph: A new hallucinogenic drug, described as much more powerful then LSD and similar in effect to a secret military nerve gas, is in widespread distribution in California.

headline.main: A Drug More Potent Than LSD Widely Distributed in California; Dangerous Drug Being Sold on Coast

docs.abstract: Dr F H Meyers notes similarity in effects between BZ and new hallucinogenic drug STP
docs.snippet: A new hallucinogenic drug, described as much more powerful then LSD and similar in effect to a secret military nerve gas, is in widespread distribution in California.
